admin_router.description: A content-based routing component called to determine which gateway to send requests to for processing, for events relating to use of the admin tools.

game_router.description: A content-based routing component called by servers/message brokers to determine which gateway to send requests to for processing, for events relating to in-game play.

log_router.description: A content router for directing backend activities related to logging and monitoring.

triggers_router.description: A content router used for determining what gateway component to call based on triggered service activity associated with a datatype channel or other multi-step service paths.
